content:
I get the following non-breaking error when building a new version of the davinci-pas guide:

java.io.FileNotFoundException: /var/folders/f8/4jjd500570q0jt3h1stsf9sr0000gn/T/comparison/cs-PASInformationChangeMode-PASInformationChangeMode-union.json (No such file or directory)
    at java.base/java.io.FileOutputStream.open0(Native Method)
    at java.base/java.io.FileOutputStream.open(FileOutputStream.java:292)
    at java.base/java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(FileOutputStream.java:235)
    at java.base/java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(FileOutputStream.java:124)
    at org.hl7.fhir.r5.comparison.ComparisonRenderer.renderCodeSystem(ComparisonRenderer.java:150)
    at org.hl7.fhir.r5.comparison.ComparisonRenderer.renderComparison(ComparisonRenderer.java:117)
    at org.hl7.fhir.r5.comparison.ComparisonRenderer.processList(ComparisonRenderer.java:88)
    at org.hl7.fhir.r5.comparison.ComparisonRenderer.render(ComparisonRenderer.java:64)
    at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.PreviousVersionComparator.finishChecks(PreviousVersionComparator.java:249)
